action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#! /bin/sh
source /etc/profile
end=$((SECONDS+60))
nodes=0

while [ $SECONDS -lt $end ] && [ $nodes != "1" ]; do
	nodes=$(discover_nodes | grep "u'eth0'" | egrep "@@{DummyAPI.CVM01_IP}@@" | wc -l)
    sleep 10
done

if [[ $nodes != "1" ]]; then 
exit 1 
fi

# Variables
pe_username = '@@{LancelotCVM.PE_USERNAME}@@'
pe_password = '@@{LancelotCVM.PE_PASSWORD}@@'
pe_vip = '@@{LancelotCVM.PE_VIP}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json'}
vm_uuid= "@@{platform.metadata.uuid}@@"
size = @@{CVM_DISK_SIZE}@@*1024*1024*1024
print size

# Get storage container uuid
payload = {}
api_url = "https://"+pe_vip+":9440/PrismGateway/services/rest/v2.0/vms/"+vm_uuid+"?include_vm_disk_config=true"

resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', auth='BASIC', user=pe_username, passwd=pe_password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers)
if resp.ok:
  storage_config = json.loads(resp.text)
  storage_container_uuid = storage_config["vm_disk_info"][1]["storage_container_uuid"]
  print "Storage container uuid is", storage_container_uuid
else:
  print "Error getting storage container uuid", json.dumps(json.loads(resp.content), indent=4)
  exit(1)


# Add new disk to CVM
payload = {"vm_disks":[{"is_cdrom": 'false',"disk_address":{"device_bus":"SCSI","device_index": 1},"vm_disk_create":{"size": size, "storage_container_uuid": storage_container_uuid}}]}
api_url = "https://"+pe_vip+":9440/PrismGateway/services/rest/v2.0/vms/"+vm_uuid+"/disks/attach"
                   
resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=pe_username, passwd=pe_password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers)
if resp.ok:
  print "Add new disk to CVM successfull", json.loads(resp.text)
else:
  print "Error getting storage container uuid", json.loads(resp.content)
  exit(1)

#! /bin/sh
curl -s -k -u admin:Nutan1x! -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{"username":"EMEA GSO","companyName":"Nutanix","jobTitle":"EMEA GSO"}' https://localhost:9440/PrismGateway/services/rest/v1/eulas/accept

#! /bin/sh
curl -s -k -u admin:Nutan1x! -X PUT --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{"enable":false,"enableDefaultNutanixEmail":false,"isPulsePromptNeeded":false,"remindLater":false}' https://localhost:9440/PrismGateway/services/rest/v1/pulse

attrs.script:
source /etc/profile
vm_name='@@{calm_username}@@-@@{calm_application_name}@@'-ESX01
acli -y vm.delete $vm_name

source /etc/profile
isolated_network='@@{calm_username}@@-@@{calm_application_name}@@'-01

acli -y net.delete $isolated_network

write_files: 
- content: |
    DEVICE="eth0"
    NM_CONTROLLED="no"
    ONBOOT="yes"
    BOOTPROTO=static
    IPADDR=@@{DummyAPI.CVM01_IP}@@
    NETMASK=255.255.255.0
    GATEWAY=@@{DummyAPI.GATEWAY_IP}@@
  path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
runcmd:
- service network restart

attrs.script:
# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json'}

# Get Token
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/user"  
resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
r = json.loads(resp.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(resp.status_code))
print('Resp: {0}'.format(resp))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(resp.content)))
print("TOKEN: {0}".format(json.loads(resp.content)['data']['token']))

print "IPAM_TOKEN=",r['data']['token']

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
ipam_token = '@@{IPAM_TOKEN}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}

# Get Subnets
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/sections/1/subnets"  
resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
r = json.loads(resp.text)
data=r['data']

# Parsing, getting subnet with 0 IPs Allocated
for element in data:
    subnet=element['usage']['used']
    if subnet == "0":
        print "FREE_SUBNET=",element['subnet']
        print "FREE_SUBNET_ID=",element['id']
        break
    else:
       continue

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
ipam_token = '@@{IPAM_TOKEN}@@'
ipam_free_subnet_id = '@@{FREE_SUBNET_ID}@@'
ipam_free_subnet = '@@{FREE_SUBNET}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}
hosts = '@@{NestedVMs}@@'.split(',')
owner = '@@{calm_username}@@'


# Determining Gateway VLAN98 or VLAN99
free_subnet=ipam_free_subnet.split('.')
if free_subnet[2] == "98":
  print "GATEWAY_IP=10.68.98.1"
elif free_subnet[2] == "99":
  print "GATEWAY_IP=10.68.99.1"
else:
  print "error"
  exit(1)
    
# Allocate IPs on the subnet
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/addresses/first_free/"+ipam_free_subnet_id+""

for host in hosts:
  payload = {"hostname": host, "description": host, "owner": owner}
  resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers)
  r = json.loads(resp.content)
  print host+"_IP=",r['data']

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json'}


# Get Token
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/user" 
resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
r = json.loads(resp.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(resp.status_code))
print('Resp: {0}'.format(resp))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(resp.content)))
print("TOKEN: {0}".format(json.loads(resp.content)['data']['token']))

print "IPAM_TOKEN=",r['data']['token']

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
ipam_token = '@@{IPAM_TOKEN}@@'
ipam_free_subnet_id ='@@{FREE_SUBNET_ID}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}

# Allocate IPs on the subnet
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}
hosts_IPs = ["@@{ESX01_IP}@@", "@@{CVM01_IP}@@"]

for IP in hosts_IPs:
  api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/addresses/"+IP+"/"+ipam_free_subnet_id+""
  resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='DELETE', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
  r = json.loads(resp.content)
  print r

attrs.script:
var = '@@{AHV_STATS}@@'
r=json.loads(var)
data=r['data']

# Sort hosts by memory usage
ordered_keys = sorted(data.values(), key=lambda v: (v['mem_usage_bytes']))
print "host_mem_usage=",ordered_keys[0]['mem_usage_bytes']
print "ahv_pinning_esx01_uuid=",ordered_keys[0]['uuid']

source /etc/profile
vm_name='@@{calm_username}@@-@@{calm_application_name}@@-ESX01'
isolated_network='@@{calm_username}@@-@@{calm_application_name}@@'-01

acli vm.create $vm_name num_vcpus=8 memory=32G container=General-1
acli vm.disk_create $vm_name clone_from_image=TEMPLATE-ESXi bus=ide index=0
acli net.create $isolated_network vswitch_name=br1 vlan=0
acli vm.nic_create $vm_name model=e1000 network="NestedESXi-DHCP" ip='@@{DummyAPI.ESX01_IP}@@'
acli vm.nic_create $vm_name model=e1000 network=$isolated_network
acli vm.update $vm_name cpu_passthrough=true
acli vm.affinity_set $vm_name host_list='@@{ahv_pinning_esx01_name}@@'
acli vm.on $vm_name

source /etc/profile

ssh -i /home/nutanix/.ssh/id_rsa -l root '@@{DummyAPI.ESX01_IP}@@' 'esxcli network ip interface ipv4 set -i vmk0 -I @@{DummyAPI.ESX01_IP}@@ -N 255.255.255.0 -t static;esxcfg-route 10.68.98.1;exit'

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#! /bin/sh
source /etc/profile
end=$((SECONDS+60))
nodes=0

while [ $SECONDS -lt $end ] && [ $nodes != "1" ]; do
	nodes=$(discover_nodes | grep "u'eth0'" | egrep "@@{DummyAPI.CVM01_IP}@@" | wc -l)
    sleep 10
done

if [[ $nodes != "1" ]]; then 
exit 1 
fi

# Variables
pe_username = '@@{LancelotCVM.PE_USERNAME}@@'
pe_password = '@@{LancelotCVM.PE_PASSWORD}@@'
pe_vip = '@@{LancelotCVM.PE_VIP}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json'}
vm_uuid= "@@{platform.metadata.uuid}@@"
size = @@{CVM_DISK_SIZE}@@*1024*1024*1024
print size

# Get storage container uuid
payload = {}
api_url = "https://"+pe_vip+":9440/PrismGateway/services/rest/v2.0/vms/"+vm_uuid+"?include_vm_disk_config=true"

resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', auth='BASIC', user=pe_username, passwd=pe_password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers)
if resp.ok:
  storage_config = json.loads(resp.text)
  storage_container_uuid = storage_config["vm_disk_info"][1]["storage_container_uuid"]
  print "Storage container uuid is", storage_container_uuid
else:
  print "Error getting storage container uuid", json.dumps(json.loads(resp.content), indent=4)
  exit(1)


# Add new disk to CVM
payload = {"vm_disks":[{"is_cdrom": 'false',"disk_address":{"device_bus":"SCSI","device_index": 1},"vm_disk_create":{"size": size, "storage_container_uuid": storage_container_uuid}}]}
api_url = "https://"+pe_vip+":9440/PrismGateway/services/rest/v2.0/vms/"+vm_uuid+"/disks/attach"
                   
resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=pe_username, passwd=pe_password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers)
if resp.ok:
  print "Add new disk to CVM successfull", json.loads(resp.text)
else:
  print "Error getting storage container uuid", json.loads(resp.content)
  exit(1)

#! /bin/sh
curl -s -k -u admin:Nutan1x! -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{"username":"EMEA GSO","companyName":"Nutanix","jobTitle":"EMEA GSO"}' https://localhost:9440/PrismGateway/services/rest/v1/eulas/accept

#! /bin/sh
curl -s -k -u admin:Nutan1x! -X PUT --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{"enable":false,"enableDefaultNutanixEmail":false,"isPulsePromptNeeded":false,"remindLater":false}' https://localhost:9440/PrismGateway/services/rest/v1/pulse

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes created VMs as well

attrs.script:
source /etc/profile
vm_name='@@{calm_username}@@-@@{calm_application_name}@@'-ESX01
acli -y vm.delete $vm_name

source /etc/profile
isolated_network='@@{calm_username}@@-@@{calm_application_name}@@'-01

acli -y net.delete $isolated_network

action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
write_files: 
- content: |
    DEVICE="eth0"
    NM_CONTROLLED="no"
    ONBOOT="yes"
    BOOTPROTO=static
    IPADDR=@@{DummyAPI.CVM01_IP}@@
    NETMASK=255.255.255.0
    GATEWAY=@@{DummyAPI.GATEWAY_IP}@@
  path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
runcmd:
- service network restart

attrs.script:
source /etc/profile
sudo rm /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-tun0

source /etc/profile
isolated_network='@@{calm_username}@@-@@{calm_application_name}@@'-01

acli vm.nic_create '@@{NestedCVM01.name}@@' model=e1000 network=$isolated_network

source /etc/profile
sudo ifdown eth1 && ifup eth1
genesis restart

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json'}

# Get Token
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/user"  
resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
r = json.loads(resp.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(resp.status_code))
print('Resp: {0}'.format(resp))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(resp.content)))
print("TOKEN: {0}".format(json.loads(resp.content)['data']['token']))

print "IPAM_TOKEN=",r['data']['token']

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
ipam_token = '@@{IPAM_TOKEN}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}

# Get Subnets
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/sections/1/subnets"  
resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
r = json.loads(resp.text)
data=r['data']

# Parsing, getting subnet with 0 IPs Allocated
for element in data:
    subnet=element['usage']['used']
    if subnet == "0":
        print "FREE_SUBNET=",element['subnet']
        print "FREE_SUBNET_ID=",element['id']
        break
    else:
       continue

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
ipam_token = '@@{IPAM_TOKEN}@@'
ipam_free_subnet_id = '@@{FREE_SUBNET_ID}@@'
ipam_free_subnet = '@@{FREE_SUBNET}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}
hosts = '@@{NestedVMs}@@'.split(',')
owner = '@@{calm_username}@@'


# Determining Gateway VLAN98 or VLAN99
free_subnet=ipam_free_subnet.split('.')
if free_subnet[2] == "98":
  print "GATEWAY_IP=10.68.98.1"
elif free_subnet[2] == "99":
  print "GATEWAY_IP=10.68.99.1"
else:
  print "error"
  exit(1)
    
# Allocate IPs on the subnet
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/addresses/first_free/"+ipam_free_subnet_id+""

for host in hosts:
  payload = {"hostname": host, "description": host, "owner": owner}
  resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers)
  r = json.loads(resp.content)
  print host+"_IP=",r['data']

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json'}


# Get Token
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/user" 
resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
r = json.loads(resp.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(resp.status_code))
print('Resp: {0}'.format(resp))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(resp.content)))
print("TOKEN: {0}".format(json.loads(resp.content)['data']['token']))

print "IPAM_TOKEN=",r['data']['token']

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
ipam_token = '@@{IPAM_TOKEN}@@'
ipam_free_subnet_id ='@@{FREE_SUBNET_ID}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}

# Allocate IPs on the subnet
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}
hosts_IPs = ["@@{ESX01_IP}@@", "@@{CVM01_IP}@@"]

for IP in hosts_IPs:
  api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/addresses/"+IP+"/"+ipam_free_subnet_id+""
  resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='DELETE', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
  r = json.loads(resp.content)
  print r

var = '@@{AHV_STATS}@@'
r=json.loads(var)
data=r['data']

# Sort hosts by memory usage
ordered_keys = sorted(data.values(), key=lambda v: (v['mem_usage_bytes']))
print "host_mem_usage=",ordered_keys[0]['mem_usage_bytes']
print "ahv_pinning_esx01_uuid=",ordered_keys[0]['uuid']

source /etc/profile
vm_name='@@{calm_username}@@-@@{calm_application_name}@@-ESX01'
isolated_network='@@{calm_username}@@-@@{calm_application_name}@@'-01

acli vm.create $vm_name num_vcpus=8 memory=32G container=General-1
acli vm.disk_create $vm_name clone_from_image=TEMPLATE-ESXi bus=ide index=0
acli net.create $isolated_network vswitch_name=br1 vlan=0
acli vm.nic_create $vm_name model=e1000 network="NestedESXi-DHCP" ip='@@{DummyAPI.ESX01_IP}@@'
acli vm.nic_create $vm_name model=e1000 network=$isolated_network
acli vm.update $vm_name cpu_passthrough=true
acli vm.affinity_set $vm_name host_list='@@{ahv_pinning_esx01_name}@@'
acli vm.on $vm_name

source /etc/profile

ssh -i /home/nutanix/.ssh/id_rsa -l root '@@{DummyAPI.ESX01_IP}@@' 'esxcli network ip interface ipv4 set -i vmk0 -I @@{DummyAPI.ESX01_IP}@@ -N 255.255.255.0 -t static;esxcfg-route 10.68.98.1;exit'
